title: [Large-scale] Designing Practical Training Based on Taekwondo Training-Competition Behavior Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic taekwondo techniques and comprehension of competition rules
context.additional_context: Mobile-based Taekwondo strategy analysis course for working professionals, utilizing smartphones in non-PC environments.

learning_goals: Learners can measure attack frequency/distance similar to game environments with 80% accuracy in training settings.
Learners can improve the predictability of their movements by over 70% through smartphone video analysis.
Learners can evaluate three psychological states (arousal, anxiety, cognitive load) identical to game conditions using three metrics during training.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
